name: Alien Apocalypse (pritamde12)
description:
The goal of the player is to produce enough battery power to create the Destroyer Turret which will finally defeat the Alien Mothership.

Move near the helicopter to bring up the UI. Press the numeric 1,2 and 3 to generate the particular turret or Battery Generator.

Collect the Power that the Battery Generator produces. A Battery Generator produces 30 power every 15 seconds.

The power of the Turret reduces over time. To recharge go near it and click the Left Mouse Button. It cost's 30 Power to recharge a Turret.

When you have 200 Power build the Destroyer Turret and finish the Mothership.

[KNOWN BUGS]

*The player needs to move away from the Helicopter to bring up the UI again.
